title: How to Make a Flash Diffuser With a Drawer Liner

steps.headline: Cut the drawer liner to approximately 5 X 13 inches (13 X 33 cm).
If you are using the wristband, then put it on the flash first.
Wrap one side of the liner around the flash and then wrap the other side around it as well
Take the bracelet and push it around the diffuser.
steps.description: This is a more stopgap measure in case you don't have the Velcro. It can be quite difficult to push the bracelet over the diffuser.

steps.headline: Take the Velcro and apply it to one side of the diffuser.
Add the second piece of Velcro to the other end of the diffuser on the other side of it.
steps.description: Here is what it would look like if it is correct and folded over.

text: Cut the drawer liner to approximately 5 X 13 inches (13 X 33 cm).  If you are using the wristband, then put it on the flash first.  Wrap one side of the liner around the flash and then wrap the other side around it as well  Take the bracelet and push it around the diffuser. This is a more stopgap measure in case you don't have the Velcro. It can be quite difficult to push the bracelet over the diffuser. Take the Velcro and apply it to one side of the diffuser.  Add the second piece of Velcro to the other end of the diffuser on the other side of it. Here is what it would look like if it is correct and folded over. Finished product.
